full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 209 of 262 1920 LC8Cmax7 Rodgers - cross 1 A. Yes. 2 Q. Jeff Shantz was Epstein's attorney; isn't that right? 3 A. Yes. 4 Q. And Eva is Eva Dubin; correct? 5 A. Yes. 6 Q. She was Epstein's former girlfriend, wasn't she? 7 A. Yes. 8 Q. And before she was Eva Dubin, she was Eva Anderson? 9 A. Yes. 10 Q. Eva Anderson later married Glenn Dubin and became Eva Dubin; right? 11 12 A. Yes. 13 Q. Are you aware that Glenn Dubin is a billionaire hedge fund manager? 14 15 A. Yes. 16 Q. And he was one of Epstein's clients; right? 17 A. I'm not sure about that. 18 Q. Okay. Just to round it out, Russ Kippus (ph.), he was another pilot; right? 19 20 A. Yes. 21 Q. He would sometimes fill in when one of the other pilots couldn't do it? 22 23 A. Yes. 24 Q. Now, again, we'll look back at the name, which is Jane's true first name; correct? 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013487
